description: Birmingham Marriott Hotel offers a great location, putting you within a 15-minute walk of International Convention Centre and Birmingham Botanical Gardens. You can grab a bite to eat at the restaurant and visit the spa to be pampered with massages, body wraps, or mani/pedis. An indoor pool and a bar/lounge are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer up nice touches like designer toiletries and pillowtop beds with Egyptian cotton sheets.

DESCRIPTION.value: Birmingham Marriott Hotel offers a great location, putting you within a 15-minute walk of International Convention Centre and Birmingham Botanical Gardens. You can grab a bite to eat at the restaurant and visit the spa to be pampered with massages, body wraps, or mani/pedis. An indoor pool and a bar/lounge are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer up nice touches like designer toiletries and pillowtop beds with Egyptian cotton sheets.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
In addition to a full-service spa, Birmingham Marriott Hotel features an indoor pool and a health club. The hotel offers a restaurant. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access.

This 4-star property offers access to a business center and meeting rooms. 6 meeting rooms are available. This business-friendly hotel also offers a spa tub, a sauna, and spa services. Parking is available onsite for a surcharge.

DINING.value:
Buffet breakfasts are available for a surcharge.
Birmingham Marriott Hotel has a restaurant serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
Room service (during limited hours) is available.

RECREATION.value:
An indoor pool and a spa tub are on site. Other recreational amenities include a health club and a sauna.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The closest major airports to Birmingham Marriott Hotel are:
Birmingham (BHX) - 12.8 km / 8 mi
Coventry (CVT) - 31.4 km / 19.5 mi

The preferred airport for Birmingham Marriott Hotel is Birmingham (BHX).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

HCOM_SPA.value:
Guests can indulge in a pampering treatment at the hotel's full-service spa, West 12 Health and Beauty. Services include massages, facials, body wraps, and body treatments. The spa is equipped with a steam room.

The spa is open daily.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Located in the heart of Birmingham, this spa hotel is within a 15-minute walk of Brindleyplace, International Convention Centre, and Birmingham Botanical Gardens. Barclaycard Arena and The Mailbox are also within 1 mi (2 km).

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for buffet breakfast: GBP 14.95 per person (approximately)
  • Fee for in-room wireless Internet: GBP 15 per night (rates may vary)
  • Fee for in-room high-speed Internet (wired): GBP 15 per day (rates may vary)
  • Self parking fee: GBP 13 per day
  • Rollaway bed fee: GBP 20 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel with spa, near Birmingham Botanical Gardens
